## rclone authorize

Remote authorization.

### Synopsis


Remote authorization. Used to authorize a remote or headless
rclone from a machine with a browser - use as instructed by
rclone config.

```
rclone authorize [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for authorize
```
